EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Web Services cancellation email error - Sorry.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Pivotal Web Services user,
We apologize for sending you a “Pivotal Web Services cancelled your account” email. This email may mention a non-zero outstanding balance, which you can disregard.
This email was sent to some users who previously tried Pivotal Web Services. We apologize for the inconvenience.
To make up for our mistake, we'd like to invite you to try the improved Pivotal Web Services with another free 60-day trial. To accept this trial please email support@run.pivotal.io <mailto:support@run.pivotal.io> by Dec 1, 2014.
Again please accept our apologies.
Sincerely, The Pivotal Web Services Team
